Package rest

The rest package contains services that are meant to be called using the REST interface

See:
          Description

Class Summary
authenticationService REST interface to log a user in Created by rjewing on 1/14/14.
elementService REST interface for creating elements, to be called from the interface or other consuming applications.
expeditionService REST interface calls for working with expeditions.
groupService REST interface calls for working with data groups.
projectService REST interface calls for working with projects.
resolverMetadataService The resolver service searches for identifiers in the BCID system and in EZID and returns a JSON representation of results containing identifier metadata.
resolverService This is the core resolver Service for BCIDs.
serviceErrorReporter serviceReporter provides reporting functions for the various BCID services.
userService Created by rjewing on 2/11/14.
WadlResources Describes the REST service in a human readable manner
 

Package rest Description

The rest package contains services that are meant to be called using the REST interface

REST documentation
